name: Target Terror
description:
Target: Terror is a remake of the popular arcade shooter and will test your reflexes and skills as you blast your way through this light-gun shooter. Taking full advantage of Wii Remote and the Wii Zapper there is a seamless transition from the arcade to the Wii.

Target: Terror puts you in the place of an elite counter-terrorist agent who is charged with protecting the US from all terrorist activities. With a full-scale assault spanning the entire nation, players can show these terrorist thugs who’s boss, using an assortment of lethal weapons including machine guns, grenade launchers, freeze guns, flamethrowers and even an orbital laser beam from space. Target: Terror also features a unique “Justice Mode,” allowing players to dual-wield weapons for twice the mayhem.

Features:

Arcade style action brought to your home with full integration of the Wii Zapper peripheral

“Justice Mode,” allowing players to dual-wield weapons for twice the mayhem

Fun and humorous mini-games inspired by a variety of arcade classics
